org.ametiste.metrics

Interface MetricsService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregatingMetricsService, MetaMetricsCounter, MockMetricsService

    public interface MetricsService
    Service for metric registration
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createEvent(java.lang.String metricId, int eventValue)
      Creates event in time with eventValue for metricId.

      void increment(java.lang.String metricId)
      Increments counter to 1 for metrics with id metricId

    • Method Detail

      • increment

        void increment(java.lang.String metricId)
        Increments counter to 1 for metrics with id metricId
        Parameters:
        metricId - identifier of metric

      • increment

        void increment(java.lang.String metricId,
               int incrementValue)
        Increments counter to incrementValue for metrics with id metricId
        Parameters:
        metricId - identifier of metric
        incrementValue - delta of increment

      • createEvent

        @Deprecated
void createEvent(java.lang.String metricId,
                             long startValue,
                             long endValue)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates event in time with lower and higher values for metricId.
        Parameters:
        metricId - identifier of metric
        startValue - logged event start time
        endValue - logged event end time

      • createEvent

        void createEvent(java.lang.String metricId,
                 int eventValue)
        Creates event in time with eventValue for metricId. Can be used to register definite values in time or events with time values (time of method call)
        Parameters:
        metricId - identifier of metric
        eventValue - logged event start time
